name: Cinergy Ventures
overview: Cinergy Ventures is the venture capital arm of Cinergy Corp. Cinergy Ventures invests in developing energy technologies that will create the energy sources and services of tomorrow. Cinergy Ventures invests more than money; we invest our time, talent and existing infrastructure into the development and promotion of new businesses we partner with, thereby accelerating the path to success. Cinergy’s environment for success is further enhanced by partnering with other financial and technology enterprises to offer the widest variety of expertise to the companies we invest in, and the broadest possible range of proving grounds for the technology under development. Cinergy Corp. is a $6 billion, vertically-integrated energy company headquartered in Cincinnati. Since its inception, Cinergy Ventures’ portfolio has expanded from about $30 million to over $130 million invested in all areas of the energy tech value chain.

funding_round.source_description: Battelle Ventures Joins $12-million Series C Financing of SmartSynch, a Leader in Wireless Smart Metering Technology; Marks the Fund's Second Investment in the Energy Sector.
